p: All extracts of H. officinalis were subjected to the MTT assay [ 32] for the evaluation of their cytotoxic effects on human keratinocyte (HaCaT) and lung adenocarcinoma (A549) during 72 h of exposure. The obtained data were compared with the values of the medium with DMSO 0.1% (negative control), and doxorubicin was used as positive control.
